entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • AspCore 6 SignalR Groups.AddToGroupAsync Bug #43767
  • NullReferenceException when defining @page route with parameter #43763
  • Route Group is a fantastic feature to streamline code towards maintenance over decades with steep climb #43759
    Discussions
  • [Blazor .NET MUAI] Not all CSS cursor properties are functional #43758
  • [Blazor WebAssembly Project Template] Change web app manifest extension to “webmanifest” #43755
  • [SignalR-Client-Cpp] cannot start a connection on linux arm #43753
  • Failed to authenticate HTTPS connection #43752
  • CascadingValue ignoring element's razor definition #43750
  • Publish Blazor wasm hosted with x64 Platform on the server results in RuntimeIdentifier compatibility exception #43749
    .NET 8 Planning
  • OutputCaching make IOutputCacheKeyProvider public #43747

Closed

  • Perf regression: fortunes #43740
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, mvc #43742
  • Perf regression: caching, fortunes_actix #43748
  • Roma #43766
  • Web API error response for malformed json using Text.Json is misleading and is exposing internals. #40202
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Perf regression: mapaction, plaintext, plaintext_nodejs #43743
  • Swagger / OpenAPI support in gRPC JSON transcoding #43294

PullRequests

Created

  • Update tests to reflect change of web app manifest extension in React C# template #43765
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Fixed summary for FileStream property. #43764
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `afd902e` to `0e0d9fe` #43762
    area-infrastructure
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `1edf19d` to `ec91da8` #43761
    area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor WebAssembly] Change web app manifest extension to “webmanifest” #43756
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Add query parameters to gRPC transcoding OpenAPI #43751
    area-grpc, 7.0-rc2
  • Add framework to gRPC template's dotnetcli.host.json #43746
    area-mvc, area-grpc
  • [release/7.0] Cleanup and tests around gRPC transcoding error handling #43745
    area-grpc, 7.0-rc2

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Fix auth exception stopping QUIC connection listener #43730
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc2
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 1984327 #43599
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Update gRPC and Protobuf dependencies #43709
    area-infrastructure, area-grpc, 7.0-rc2
